alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:24PM CDT until June 16 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Saunders Elevator, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manter and The Saunders Elevator. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
